nodes.text: This human male was the father of Mart Mattin, and the brother of Jun Sato, a commander in the growing rebellion against the Galactic Empire. Mattin's father was a member of Iron Squadron, a squadron of pilots which opposed the tyranny of the Empire. His fighting days came to an end, however, when he was killed during Uprisings on Mykapo on Mykapo. He was married to a human female with whom he had Mart Mattin.
